T = int(input())
    for i in range(T):
        N, K = map(int, input().split())
        print(N + (K - 1))
9:
n, q = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    for i in range(q):
        x, y = map(int, input().split())
        a[x:y+1] = [n+1]*(y-x+1)
    print(a.count(n+1))
14:
t = int(input())
    for i in range(t):
        n, p = map(int, input().split())
        k = list(map(int, input().split()))
        k.sort()
        k.reverse()
        s = 0
        for j in range(n):
            s += k[j]**p
        s1 = 0
        s2 = 0
        for j in range(n):
            if s1 < s2:
                s1 += k[j]**p
            else:
                s2 += k[j]**p
        print(abs(s1-s2)%1000000007)
15:
def solve(n, p, k):
        k.sort()
        k.reverse()
        s = sum(k)
        if s % p != 0:
            return s
        else:
            s = s // p
            k = k[:p]
            k.sort()
            k.reverse()
            return abs(sum(k[:s]) - sum(k[s:]))

    t = int(input())
    for i in range(t):
        n, p = map(int, input().split())
        k = list(map(int, input().split()))
        print(solve(n, p, k))
